summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4906 for the improvement of the alley in Block 2, Law's Addition and Block 16, Capitol Hill Addition NO. 2, being the alley between 16th Avenue North and 17th Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Mercer Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 56225, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
